title: Shark Anti Hair Wrap & Flexology Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
description_html:
Tired of removing tangled hair from your vacuum cleaner's brush-roll? Shark's signature Anti Hair Wrap Technology separates and removes hair from the motorised brush-roll as you clean, sucking it straight up into the dust cup. Perfect for long, short and pet hair. Enjoy up to 40 minutes of run-time then charge Shark's removable battery pack on or off the vacuum, wherever suits you. A battery light indicator lets you know how much charge is remaining. (In ION power mode, with non-motorised tool).

Flexology bends so you don't have to. At the touch of a button, the flexible wand bends to easily clean underneath low-lying furniture. When you've finished, fold down for compact, freestanding storage and charging.

Easily switch between carpet and hard floor modes using convenient handle controls. Pull the Boost trigger for extra power. Bright LED headlights in the floorhead help to illuminate hidden dust under furniture.

Transform into a handheld vacuum at the touch of a button – perfect for cleaning stairs, soft furnishings, in the car and more. Clean anywhere with the included Crevice Tool and Upholstery Tool, which can be stored in the handy accessory bag.

Anti-Allergen Complete Seal captures and traps 99.9% of dust and allergens inside the vacuum, not releasing them back into the air you breathe. (Based on IEC standard 62885-2 Cl. 5.11 at 0.3 to 10 microns).

Floor suitability:

  • Suitable for carpets and rugs.
  • Suitable for deep pile carpet and rugs.
  • Suitable for hard floors.
  • Suitable for laminate flooring.
  • Suitable for upholstery.
  • Suitable for stairs.

Vacuum cleaner features:

  • Weight 3.75kg.
  • Size H119, W27, D17cm.
  • Charge time: 3.5 hours to fully charge.
  • 40 mins, depending on the setting used.
  • Low battery indicator.
  • Number of batteries in pack: 1.
  • Detachable handheld included.
  • Power boost - clean with increased power.
  • HEPA filter - traps small particles and pet dander, making it excellent for allergy sufferers.
  • Washable filter - wash regularly to maintain suction.
  • Motorised floor head - drives bristles in to carpet to remove ground in dirt.
  • Adjustable floorhead - switch between carpet and hard floor at the touch of a button.
  • Includes crevice nozzle, upholstery nozzle, .
  • Dust capacity 0.7 litre.
  • Dustbag full indicator.
  • 25.2 volts.
  • Noise level: 86dB.

General information:

  • Model number: IZ202UK.
  • Manufacturer's 5 year (2 year on batteries) guarantee.
  • EAN: 0622356262996.

title: Samsung 50 Inch QE50QEF1AU Smart 4K UHD HDR QLED TV
description_html:
This is our one to watch. Experience true-to-life 4K detail and picture-perfect colour with this Quantum HDR TV from Samsung – the World's best-selling TV brand. The QEF1 offers intelligent 4K upscaling and 100% colour volume with Real Quantum Dot and sound that tracks the on-screen action for a truly immersive audio-visual experience, whatever content you are watching. This Smart TV is powered by Tizen OS, so you can watch your favourite digital TV channels.

Samsung TV Plus provides instant access to thousands of TV shows and movies, and all for free. Just connect to the internet and watch live and on-demand entertainment, news, sports highlights, kids shows, and more - no strings attached. Now that really is smart!

Samsung Gaming Hub brings together the biggest console and streaming games from Xbox and others, straight to your Samsung TV. You don't need a console, and there are no downloads or storage limits - just turn on your TV and play. Game Pass and a compatible controller are required.

The Q4 AI Gen1 Processor in this Samsung TV takes care of the 4K detail and upscaling, whilst Quantum HDR dynamically optimises every single frame in real time, so you can enjoy greater depth and detail in every scene.

For a truly immersive viewing experience, you need great sound. As well as Object Tracking Sound Lite, this Samsung TV has Adaptive Sound technology to make sure you hear every detail.

The beautifully slim design of this TV blends into your decor, elevating your style without taking over.

Model number: QE50QEF1AU.

2025 model.

Dimensions and Weight

  • Screen size: 50 inches.
  • Size of TV H64.7, W112.03, D6cm.
  • Size of TV with stand: H69.4, W112.03, D23.7cm.
  • Width of TV stand 75.06cm.
  • Weight of TV without stand 9.6kg (unpackaged).
  • Weight of TV with stand 9.9kg.
  • Suitable for wall mounting 200 x 200 bracket.
  • Length of cable: 1.5m.
  • Packaged size H76.5, W125.5, D12.7cm.
  • Packaged weight 13.5kg.

Screen Technology

  • QLED TV Screen.
  • 4K Ultra HD display resolution.
  • Micro dimming technology improves the contrast by dimming individual sections of the TV screen.
  • HDR.
  • HDR10.
  • HDR 10+.
  • Motion rate 50Hz.
  • Resolution 3840 x 2160 pixels.

Sound Technology

  • 2 channel sound system.
  • 20 watt RMS power output.

Connectivity

  • 1 USB port and 3 HDMI sockets.
  • Built in Wi-Fi.
  • Ethernet connection.
  • Bluetooth.

Smart TV features

  • Voice control - works with Amazon Alexa, works with Google assistant, built in Bixby, .
  • Tizen operating system.
  • Compatible with the following smart apps: Now TV, Disney+, Netflix, iTVX, My5, All 4, Amazon Prime, YouTube.
  • Internet browser.
  • Miracast.

Additional features

  • Features USB recording and video playback.
  • DVB-T2CS2 digital tuner.
  • CI plus slot.
  • Sleep timer.
  • Parental controls.
  • Aerial required.

Energy efficiency information:

  • Energy efficiency class: G.
  • Energy consumption per 1000h: 69kWh.
  • Energy consumption in high dynamic mode per 1000h: 112kWh.
  • Annual power consumption 96kWh.
  • Standby power consumption 0.5 watt.

In the box

  • TV.
  • Remote control (requires 2 x AAA batteries, included).
  • Power cable.
  • TV stand.
  • Also in the box: User Manual.

General information:

  • Manufacturer's 1 year guarantee.
  • EAN: 8806097122074.

About the brand:

The Very Collection is full of trending updates, seasonal staples, and affordable basics, designed to be your fail-safe fashion formula for looking good all year round. With a focus on premium fabrics, it’s carefully curated to bring you the best of what’s new right now, with considered and exclusive designs for women, men, and the kids too.
